law.catch_line: Nine voting members of the Authority are a quorum....

text.section: Nine voting members of the Authority are a quorum.
An action of the Authority must receive the affirmative vote of at least a majority of the voting members of the Authority.
The Authority shall determine the times and places of its meetings.

A member of the Authority:
May not receive compensation; but
Is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
